title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, but they don't have any effect when moved.
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the displayed image.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to prevent confusion since they currently do not have any effect when moved.
SR: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. 3. Open a small image, such as an icon. 4. Observe that the scrollbars are misleading because they do not have any effect on the displayed image.
